data.message:
What people don't get is that he's By Far the "RAPGOD" it's not a close competition (done deal)

I know European guys who won't mention his name because they feel like "it's gotta be Jay-Z, that daft guy who thinks he's the rapgod.. 
Surname West! #whatever

And I know Afro-Carribean guys who won't mention him for the exact same reason as I mentioned above. 

My ethnic origin is Afro-Carribean but I'd back up Slim against any other lyricists (white, black, orange)

He doesn't even have to get out of his bed to deal with any "false prophet"

#toogoodandNUFFrespect
